optionDesc.en: What brings you to Valley IV?

optionDesc.cn: 洁尔佩塔很关心大家嘛。
optionDesc.en: And you have a heart of gold, Gil.

optionDesc.cn: 一定有很多需要你的地方。
optionDesc.en: I'm sure your help is very much needed.
Can we go back to Dijiang now?
Things seem to be looking up.

optionDesc.cn: 武陵城的人到清波寨了？
optionDesc.en: You sent people to the Stockade?
I get it. Leave it to us.

optionDesc.cn: 连天师说我们还有个项目？

optionDesc.en: Can I continue in the future?

optionDesc.cn: 实用就是知识最大的价值。

optionDesc.en: Hope I can really support you.
I have faith in Crowe's choice.
I believe you'll do great too.

optionDesc.cn: 别放在心上，已经解决了。

optionDesc.en: This isn't the time for arguing.
It's in your hands, Master Chen.
It was your hard work as well.
Take care of your injury first.

optionDesc.cn: 我找到了大多数研究资料。
optionDesc.en: I found most of the files.
No problem. Leave it to me.
I think I saw them before.
They use it to mark things...
I knew Fiona got us covered.
I'm not too sure for now.
I'm not too sure for now.
I'm not too sure for now.
I'm not too sure for now.

optionDesc.cn: 他似乎有苦衷，可以理解。
苦衷并不是作恶的理由。
果然很有问题，建议追责。

optionDesc.en: Where did this signal come from?

optionDesc.cn: 能确认发讯者的位置吗？
optionDesc.en: Do we have the sender's location?

optionDesc.cn: 现在或许是我们的不幸……
optionDesc.en: We might be unlucky now, but...
...Sure. I'll be right with you in a moment.
{F}Wait there. I'm heading over.{M}Wait there. I'm heading over.

optionDesc.cn: 他碰到什么麻烦事了吗？
optionDesc.en: Did he run into any trouble?

optionDesc.cn: 你知道的细节也太多了！
optionDesc.en: You know a little too much!

optionDesc.cn: 感觉你说起来头头是道！
optionDesc.en: You talk like you've tried it.
I'll have to give it a try.

optionDesc.cn: 那我更好奇比赛是什么了。
optionDesc.en: What kind of race was it?

optionDesc.cn: 已经能想象到场面很刺激。
你是怎么爱上这项比赛的？

optionDesc.en: I want to watch in person!

optionDesc.cn: 塔卫二上合适的地方很多。

optionDesc.en: Anything I can do to help?

optionDesc.cn: 难得你会主动对我说这个。

optionDesc.en: Alright, go ahead and tell me.
So you've made up your mind.
What did she say about me?
Did you run away from home?
It's a lot to digest already.
One that feels right in hand.
Why do you have two swords?
So you picked up two swords.
You shouldn't patrol all night by yourself like this.

optionDesc.cn: 你已经是终末地的一分子。

optionDesc.en: You must be proud of her.
I know what you can gift her.
A gift may not be necessary.
Did you send me this package?

optionDesc.cn: 为什么不愿意待在狼群？
optionDesc.en: So why did you leave the Pack?
Have you found the answer yet?
Are you going to sing it?

optionDesc.cn: 去认识下武库的干员吧。
去熟悉下终末地的武库吧。

optionDesc.en: I think you'll like it there.

optionDesc.cn: 正好听听荒野上的故事。
是不是到转折的地方了。
optionDesc.en: Are we reaching a plot twist?

optionDesc.cn: 所以要把摩托车拆成零件……
optionDesc.en: I see why you disassembled it.

optionDesc.cn: 大家比我想象的还努力啊。
能让你苦恼的事可不多见。
铁誓军里不常见到婚礼吧？

optionDesc.en: Got a bad feeling about this.

optionDesc.cn: 铁誓军给你发了一些资料？
你需要跟很多人对话吗？
optionDesc.en: A lot of people to talk to?

optionDesc.cn: 不要假装自己是机器人啊。
optionDesc.en: Stop pretending to be a bot.

optionDesc.cn: 赛希也会这么多愁善感吗？

optionDesc.en: Did you do that on purpose?
Good to know more about you.
Need a hand with the move?
Do I hv to wait til next time?
I get why you're laying low.

optionDesc.cn: 有什么我能帮上忙的吗？
洁尔佩塔总是心系他人。
optionDesc.en: You've got such a kind heart.
There are other ways to tell.
It's not sth you have to fix.

optionDesc.cn: 我是那些瞬间的一部分吗？
optionDesc.en: Am I a part of those moments?
What is this? A cheese survey?
That's why you want to modify?
I want a taste of it now.
You seem to really love snowpeaks.
But the act of capturing still matters.
Now I want to see it myself.

optionDesc.cn: 你们一般会做什么运动？

optionDesc.en: Prob hard to find a 3rd one...
Not unless you give me one.

optionDesc.cn: 回家见人是要带礼物的吗？
源石虫也会待在里面吗？

optionDesc.en: You're the first to say this.
You can't set it on fire tho!
I never said okay to this!

optionDesc.cn: 你这是在哪儿？菈梵朵玛？

optionDesc.en: How did you even get there?

optionDesc.cn: 我的记忆都还没恢复呢。
对塔卫二，我比你还陌生。
optionDesc.en: Thought you knew more than me.

optionDesc.cn: 我以为你更喜欢电子乐器。
你小时候这么不开心啊……

optionDesc.en: We've got the space for it.

optionDesc.cn: 已流转给总后勤办事处。
什么用途？我开始担心了。
谁叫我们是最好的伙伴呢？
我对迷你战舰比较有兴趣。

optionDesc.en: You have a lot of experience.

optionDesc.cn: 我去欣赏一下你的演技。

optionDesc.en: Why ask this all of a sudden?
I know what you're up to.
Tryna rope me in as advisor?

optionDesc.cn: 我一来，大家还敢偷懒吗？
optionDesc.en: Will people be scared of me?

optionDesc.cn: 如果当初你改变了主意……

optionDesc.en: You chose the path you wanted.
Sometimes it's nice to do so.

optionDesc.cn: 或许依然会和现在差不多。
看来不用频繁找其他人了。
你应该兼职方案调整顾问。

optionDesc.en: Oh, is it a new track?
Hard to say if I like it...

optionDesc.cn: 我喜欢轻柔一些的音乐。
我喜欢足够刺激的音乐。
我觉得是个不错的建议。
optionDesc.en: I think he has a point.
How do you feel about that?

optionDesc.cn: 你现在的体能情况如何？

optionDesc.en: Did the last training help at all?
Let me see your training plan.

optionDesc.cn: 你一直都是这么过来的吗？
所以你身上总是带着伤……

optionDesc.en: Meeting you is also our luck.

optionDesc.cn: 你能平安无事真是奇迹。

optionDesc.en: Haven't dared to open them yet.
Why don't you do it yourself?

optionDesc.cn: 我还以为会更隆重一些。

optionDesc.en: What did you get for me?
I won't fall for it again!
Just like us and this planet.
The principle holds true either way.
Last time you told a joke?

optionDesc.cn: 说明他面部神经紊乱了。
说明他在锻炼嘴角肌肉。
不想参加源石技艺比拼？

optionDesc.en: Which one has the most value?

optionDesc.cn: 原来你是这样走出来的。
希望与更宽广的宇宙对话。
optionDesc.en: I hope to explore the universe.

optionDesc.cn: 你最珍视的样本是哪一份？
optionDesc.en: Which specimen do you treasure most?
It's okay, I'm here for you.

optionDesc.cn: 有他们帮忙真是太好了。
所以，具体是要赔偿什么？
optionDesc.en: What do you have to pay?

optionDesc.cn: 该找塞什卡要这笔费用。
结果打了份不得了的工。

optionDesc.en: Why did you push so hard?
Ever dream of that door again?

optionDesc.cn: 我的失忆耽误了很多事吧。
optionDesc.en: My amnesia is a terrible thing.
I call it a unique greeting.

optionDesc.cn: 关于四号谷地的裂地者。
怎么识别裂地者的氏族？
optionDesc.en: How to tell the clans apart?

optionDesc.cn: 集成工业系统确实重要。
患者都能拿到抑制剂吗？
患上矿石病一定很痛苦吧？
大家害怕和感染者接触吗？
这让她们的关系更加牢固。

optionDesc.en: The crew mates will miss the place.

optionDesc.cn: 安全局具体承担什么工作？

optionDesc.en: I hope they get better soon.
You gonna tell a horror story?
Okay. I understand. I'll be careful.

optionDesc.cn: 看来工团真的被惹怒了。
我感觉它的意义变化了。
看来乐观也是他们的武器。

optionDesc.en: What do you think of him?
His sacrifice is not in vain.

optionDesc.cn: 我们已经离开清波寨了。

optionDesc.en: That's ... a unique way to put it.
How did she stir things up?
She threw you under the bus...
I think I dreamed of that field...

optionDesc.cn: 农田对武陵人有特殊意义。
他的愿望一定会实现的。
optionDesc.en: His wish will surely come true.

optionDesc.cn: 试验田里的作物很茂盛。
optionDesc.en: Crops in the fields look good.

optionDesc.cn: 和我们初入武陵城时一样？
optionDesc.en: Like when we first got here?

optionDesc.cn: 每次你都会亲力亲为吗？
optionDesc.en: Do you go every single time?
We owe our safety to you.
Do people here like hot pot?
How did the dish turn out?

optionDesc.cn: 有机会我们一起好好逛逛。
optionDesc.en: We can explore more when free.

optionDesc.cn: 在草地和驮兽一起打滚？

optionDesc.en: D u get chased by mama beast?

optionDesc.cn: 想不起十年前的武陵了……
我们一起保护这座城市。

optionDesc.en: I wonder who designed Chubby Lung?

optionDesc.cn: 我还以为她只是很喜欢……
optionDesc.en: I thought she was a fan too...
I didn't see any Chubby Lung.

optionDesc.cn: 现在那里会不会很危险？

optionDesc.en: Perhaps there are other ways to conduct monitoring?
